en.des_tw: latest covid-19 confirmed cases in Taiwan and news from CDC
en.des_world: latest Covid-19 world & Continent confirmed cases & confirmed cases search by countries
en.des_vaccine: Vaccine information & Vaccine delivery rate in Taiwan
en.des_game: A game made by me before the end of the deadline(totally not inspired by computer concepts teacher)
en.des_ref: Some code this website used & “OUR CODE“ (wink
en.introduction:
This website is mainly to orginize various of infromation about covid-19 epidemic, including world & Taiwan information. We hope users can easily find every infromation about COVID-19 epicdemic they want.
Also, don't forget to scroll to the bottom to give us a like. I'll be very appreciate
en.search_title: Search COVID-19 Confirmed Cases by Countries
en.all_vaccine_title: Vaccination Rate in Taiwan by Cities
en.chart1: Click to get more information about the selected city
en.vaccine_type_title: Vaccination Rate of Every Type of Vaccines in Taiwan
en.vaccine_intro_title: Information of Every Type of Vaccines in Taiwan
en.az_intro_text: AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine is a non-replicating adenovirus vector vaccine containing the SARS-CoV-2 virus spike protein (S protein) gene to prevent COVID-19.
en.moderna_intro_text: Moderna COVID-19 vaccine (Spikevax) is an mRNA vaccine for SARS-CoV-2 virus spike protein (S protein).
en.bnt_intro_text: The BioNTech (BNT162b2) COVID-19 vaccine is an mRNA vaccine containing the SARS-CoV-2 virus Sprotein. It is used to prevent COVID-19.
en.mvc_intro_text: MVC COVID-19 Vaccine is a protein subunit vaccine of vaccine containing SARS-CoV-2 recombinant spike protein, used to prevent COVID-19.

cn.des_tw: covid-19在臺灣的最新確診數資料＆疾管署的最新新聞
cn.des_world: 最新的covid-19的世界＆各洲確診數資料＆確診數查詢
cn.des_vaccine: 疫苗的介紹＆全台疫苗施打率
cn.des_game: 我在繳交期限前緊急製作的小遊戲（絕對不是受計概老師啟發）
cn.des_ref: 此網頁的參考的程式碼＆”我們的“程式碼(wink
cn.introduction:
本網站主要目的為整理各式各樣關於疫情的資料，包括世界，臺灣確診數據以及關於疫苗的資訊的彙整，讓使用者可以輕鬆地在本網站取得關於疫情的各種資料。
別忘了滑到最下方幫我們點讚喔
cn.states_title: 世界&世界六大洲確診數
cn.all_vaccine_title: 臺灣各縣市疫苗施打狀況
cn.chart1: 點擊可以得到各縣市詳細施打狀況
cn.vaccine_type_title: 臺灣內各廠牌疫苗施打率
cn.az_intro_text: AstraZeneca 之 COVID-19 疫苗是含有 SARS-CoV-2 病毒棘蛋白(S protein)基因之非複製型腺病毒載體之疫苗，用於預防 COVID-19。本疫苗已通過WHO、歐盟等其他先進國家及我國緊急授權使用。
cn.moderna_intro_text: Moderna COVID-19 疫苗(Spikevax)是 SARS-CoV-2 病毒棘蛋白(S protein)之mRNA 疫苗。本疫苗目前已通過美國、歐盟及我國等先進國家緊急授權使用。
cn.bnt_intro_text: BioNTech(BNT162b2) COVID-19 疫苗是含有 SARS-CoV-2 病毒棘蛋白(Sprotein)之 mRNA 疫苗，用於預防 COVID-19，本疫苗已通過 WHO、歐盟等其他先進國家及我國緊急授權使用。
cn.mvc_intro_text: 高端新冠肺炎疫苗(MVC COVID-19 Vaccine)是含 SARS-CoV-2 重組棘蛋白的疫苗之蛋白質次單元疫苗，用於預防 COVID-19。本疫苗已通過我國核准專案製造。

cn.game_dse:
這只是一個簡單的小遊戲，我本來想做一個精彩刺激又好玩的3A大作，但因為明天就是繳交期限了，我只好緊急做一個簡單的小遊戲放上來（這絕對不是某本書的範例）
